channel.itunes:summary: All about DigiChannel videos and charts. Every two weeks we dive into an in depth presentation of the best artists and new entries of online videos. Music videos, movies, photography and digital art, theatre and dance, sport and much more
channel.description: All about DigiChannel videos and charts. Every two weeks we dive into an in depth presentation of the best artists and new entries of online videos. Music videos, movies, photography and digital art, theatre and dance, sport and much more Look for our Vodcast in the iTunes store.

item.title: Sultan DJ GU NuBreed - Behind the Scenes new album backstage
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: Global Underground Sultan Behind the Scenes
item.description: Global Undergrounds latest addition to the NuBreed series - on a whirlwhind tour of London. Here for the photo shoot for the GU NuBreed album, the GU team took advantage and grilled him about this latest release.
item.itunes:keywords: hip hop r n b pop music backstage epk

item.title: Steve Vai Live In Minneapolis - Where The Wild Things Are from Sound Theories world tour
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: Favored Nations Entertainment
item.description: Part one of the DVD promo. Recorded and filmed at the State Theatre in Minneapolis, MN before a sold-out audience as part of Vai's successful 'Sound Theories' world tour, the DVD and CD will be released on September 29.
item.itunes:keywords: rock metal vai live concert dvd epk

item.title: Lilith And The Sinnersaint new release CD EPK Venus In Furs Lost Bay
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: Alpha South Records new CD release
item.description: L'Angelu Nassuu Dall'Etra Pert (L'angelo nata dall'altra parte - The angel born on the other side) è il titolo di un EP in uscita ad ottobre con 6 brani cantati in dialetto di Centenaro. Le canzoni incluse sono cantate nel dialetto di Centenaro (più precisamente della località Vaio). Centenaro è un agglomerato di minuscoli borghi, situato in Alta Valnure, nel comune di Ferriere ( Piacenza), al confine con le province di Genova e Parma.
item.itunes:keywords: folk country traditional italian epk

item.title: Tony Allen Preview Inspiration Information with Jimi Tenor
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: Strut Records Tony allen DVD
item.description: Strut’s Inspiration Information series moves on with the fourth album, a mouthwatering head to head between Finnish maverick Jimi Tenor and Afrobeat drumming legend, Tony Allen.
item.itunes:keywords: electronica tenor strut dance trance epk

item.title: Moderat new DVD release EPK
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: BPitch Control artis Moderat new DVD
item.description: Following on from a much earlier collaborative single, the first full-length effort pulling together Modeselektor and Apparat. Despite a name that suggests a Depeche-loving rodent -- has plenty to offer without entirely being a full-on slam dunk.
item.itunes:keywords: electronica moderat bpitch control dance trance epk

item.title: Alice Cooper - Along Came A Video
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: SPV world class artis Alice Cooper along came a spider
item.description: This video directed by Piggy D is a short making of's documentary of Along Came A Spider videoclip. Inside you can find extracts form Alice, Shep Gordon, Slash and Billy Bob Thornton interviews. Along Came A Spider is a conceptual album which tells you the story of a serial killer, named Spider, who wants to create a spider with the legs of height victims. Everything is perfect until that Spider falls in love of his final victim: a beautiful girl.
item.itunes:keywords: metal hard rock alice cooper spv records epk

item.title: Stephanie McKay Tell It Like It Is new album EPK
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: Muthas of Invention new album release by Stephanie McKay
item.description: McKay's nostalgia is for New York's early hip-hop days, recalled on 'Jackson Avenue'. She avoids the hair-shirt moralising rappers can fall into, singing: 'I wanna live every moment like I'm out of my head' on the paean to credit-card-maxing 'Oh Yeah'. There isn't enough grit to make her positivity feel earned, but her rewiring of Willy Mason's 'Oxygen' as a Hammond soul hymn confirms an open mind.
item.itunes:keywords: jazz pop rock gospel blues blind boys soul jazz cd dvd wilson steven epk

item.title: Ethio Jazz musician Mulatu Astatke feat The Heliocentrics
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: Strut records releases Mulatu Astatke Inspiration Information 3 feat The Heliocentrics
item.description: The third in Strut's Inspiration Information studio collaboration series brings together an intriguing pairing between one of Africa's great bandleaders, Mulatu Astatke, with the next level musicianship of The Heliocentrics collective from the mighty roster of Stones Throw and Now Again.
item.itunes:keywords: jazz ethio jazz Bennie Maupin Azar Lawrence Phil Ranelin gospel blues blind boys soul jazz cd dvd wilson steven epk

item.title: New Global Underground GU37 Bangkok mixed James Lavelle.
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: From Global Underground mixed by UNKLE James Lavelle.
item.description: The brand new release from Global Underground, GU37 Bangkok mixed by UNKLE James Lavelle. The fantastic new album - An eclectic, psychedelic rainbow of sound, featuring exclusive mixes and tracks from UNKLE, Doves, Radiohead, James Holden, Layo and Bushwacka, The Big Pink, Dubfire and Radio Slave
item.itunes:keywords: music, electronica, Global Underground, GU37James Lavelle UNKLE, Doves, Radiohead, James Holden, Layo and Bushwacka, The Big Pink, Dubfire, Radio Slave

item.title: The return of Ministry live
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: Thirteenth Planet Records presents Ministry Live
item.description: Live Adios Puta Madres DVD Preview. Video taken from the eleventh studio album tour, by industrial metal band Ministry. Curiosity: The limited edition digipack has an image of George W. Bush's face that morphs into a lizard creature's face and back when turned. The image is on a card that can be removed from digipack.
item.itunes:keywords: live ministry metal music digipack

item.title: The second video-clip of The Analog Session
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: Hot Elephant Records
item.description: The second video-clip of The Analog Session, featuring Alexander Robotnick and Ludus Pinsky. The whole work will be released in October by This Is Music LTD
item.itunes:keywords: electronica analog robotnick pinsky analogue dance trance epk

item.title: The Revolution CD release EPK
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: Rapster Records The Revolution in sotres now
item.description: Revolution, a Cuban music revival, not drenched in classic Cuban time signatures, the album takes that groove and embellishes it with RnB and electronica elements, resulting in a sexy and danceable offering that is sure to find its place on the Billboard charts. Six producers—Norman Cook, aka Fatboy Slim, Guy Sigsworth (Madonna, Alanis Morrissette), Marius De Vries (The Sugarcubes); Cameron McVey and Jan Stan Kybert (Massive Attack, Neneh Cherry), Rich File (James Lavelle), and Poet Name Life (Black Eyed Peas)—bringing a Latin beat and tone to these hepped-up hip-hop tracks. In addition, they brought in stellar Cuban players—including Moloko singer Roisin Murphy, emerging talent Janet G and expat Cuban hip-hop act Orishas—to add another level of authenticity.
item.itunes:keywords: electronica moderat bpitch control dance trance epk

item.title: Gospel blues band Blind Boys Of Alabama new DVD release
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: Rycodisk DVD releases Blind Boys Of Alabama
item.description: Video taken from Live in New Orleans DVD is an uplifting fusion of gospel, blues and soul from one of the longest-running groups in the world, The Blind Boys Of Alabama. Their rousing performance included favorites like Free At Last, Down By The Riverside, Amazing Grace and People Get Ready. Special guests include Susan Tedeschi, Dr. John, Preservation Hall Jazz Band, Henry Butler and Marva Wright.
item.itunes:keywords: rycodisk gospel blues blind boys soul jazz cd dvd wilson steven epk

item.title: Insurgentes - The new CD and DVD release by Steven Wilson
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: KScope releases Insurgentes by Steven Wilson
item.description: Insurgentes, recorded all over the world between January-August, as a double CD plus a DVD-A (limited to 3,000 copies) and a 4 x 10 inch vinyl version (limited to 1,000 copies), both with hardback book featuring the images of acclaimed and long time collaborator Danish photographer Lasse Hoile. Both editions are exclusive to insurgentes.org. A standard retail CD version (also including the 5.1 DVD-A) will be released on March 9, 2009.
item.itunes:keywords: rock alternative cross over kscope records cd dvd wilson steven epk

item.title: What I Do - The new promo release by Sepultura
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: SPV releases What I Do by Sepultura
item.description: What I Do video directed by Sanchez Eric, taken from A-Lex, the eleventh studio album by Brazilian heavy metal band Sepultura. It was released on 23 January 2009 by independent German record label Steamhammer Records. This is the first album featuring new drummer Jean Dolabella, since the departure of Igor Cavalera in 2006.
item.itunes:keywords: metal crossover sepultura spv 3 minutes off, metal, alternative, epk

item.title: Hip hop pioneer Grandmaster Flash releases The Bridge: Concept Of A Culture
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: New EPK release and album by Grandmaster Flash, Strut artist.
item.description: On February 23rd 2009, legendary hip hop pioneer Grandmaster Flash releases The Bridge: Concept Of A Culture on Adrenaline City Entertainment via Strut, his first high profile studio album since his final recordings for Elektra back in 1988. As a DJ, I've been blessed to see many different people, places and styles. The album title represents all the bridges I've crossed worldwide, explains Flash.
item.itunes:keywords: hip hop, rap, r and b, 3 minutes off, metal, alternative, epk

item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off

item.description: First single off Circlesquare�s new album, 'Songs About Dancing and Drugs'. The video is inspired by Robert Longo�s series, Men in the Cities. The video features dancers Miles Faber and Vincent Noiseux (from So You Think You Can Dance Canada), Julie Chapple and Alison Denham.
item.itunes:keywords: movie, trailer, indian film, bollywood, experimental video, live footage, 3 minutes off, metal, alternative, epk

item.title: Subarna Thapa movie trailer for Funeral
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: Subarna Thapa was born in 1973 in Kathmandou, Nepal. He has lived in France for several years, where he participated in a stage held by Ariane Mnouchkine at the Théâtre Du Soleil and La Fémis.
item.description: In a tiny village in modern Nepal, death pays an untimely visit to the miller. The villagers must bury him, but those who remain are only old men, women and children. The old men are now too weak to carry the miller and lay him in his grave, and the women are not allowed to touch the dead. Above all, there is no one left from his cast for the burial.
item.itunes:keywords: movie, trailer, indian film, bollywood, experimental video, live footage, 3 minutes off, metal, alternative, epk

item.title: Richie Mehta movie trailer for Amal
item.itunes:author: DigiChannel.net - 3 minutes off
item.itunes:subtitle: Filmed on location in New Delhi, India, this modern day fable asks the important question of what success means to each individual and ultimately reveals that the poorest of men are sometimes the richest.
item.description: AMAL, a multi-layered portrait of contemporary India, follows an auto-rickshaw driver in New Delhi (Amal) who is content with his small, but vital role in life. One day he drives an eccentric billionaire (G.K. Jayaram) who, disguised as a vagabond, is searching the streets for the last morsel of humanity, and someone he can leave all his money to
item.itunes:keywords: movie, trailer, indian film, bollywood, experimental video, live footage, 3 minutes off, metal, alternative, epk
